scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音,欢迎回来。第22集:落日之墓·落日城。

scenes.description: 人妖两族之人对此片边境之地的共同称呼是'落日之墓'。

visual.composition: The borderland is commonly called 'Sunset Tomb' by both human and demon races

scenes.prompt: The borderland is commonly called 'Sunset Tomb' by both human and demon races.
scenes.narration: 人妖两族之人对此片边境之地的共同称呼是'落日之墓'。

scenes.description: 据说远古时候,灵界空中并非是七个太阳,而是九个。

visual.composition: Legend says in ancient times, Spirit Realm sky had nine suns, not seven

scenes.prompt: Legend says in ancient times, Spirit Realm sky had nine suns, not seven.
scenes.narration: 据说远古时候,灵界空中并非是七个太阳,而是九个。

scenes.description: 当初人妖两族刚到灵界之时,恰好爆发一场席卷了大半个灵界种族的真灵之战。

visual.composition: When human and demon races first arrived in Spirit Realm, a True Spirit War erupted affecting most races

scenes.prompt: When human and demon races first arrived in Spirit Realm, a True Spirit War erupted affecting most races.
scenes.narration: 当初人妖两族刚到灵界之时，恰好爆发席卷大半个灵界种族的真灵之战。

scenes.description: 数以百计修为可比真仙界仙人的存在大打出手,十之八九陨落而亡,两个太阳也被波及而毁。

visual.composition: Hundreds of beings with Immortal-level cultivation fought, most perished, two suns destroyed

scenes.prompt: Hundreds of beings with Immortal-level cultivation fought, most perished, two suns destroyed.
scenes.narration: 数以百计修为可比真仙界仙人的存在大打出手，十之八九陨落，两太阳被毁。

scenes.description: 这片边境之地,据说就是其中一个太阳坠落之后,形成的巨大洼地。

visual.composition: This borderland is said to be the giant depression formed after one sun fell

scenes.prompt: This borderland is said to be the giant depression formed after one sun fell.
scenes.narration: 这片边境之地,据说就是其中一个太阳坠落之后,形成的巨大洼地。

scenes.description: 这所谓的'洼地',即使高阶修士用法宝全力飞遁,从一端到另一端也需花上年许时间。

visual.composition: This 'depression' is so vast, high-level cultivators flying at full speed need over a year to cross

scenes.prompt: This 'depression' is so vast, high-level cultivators flying at full speed need over a year to cross.
scenes.narration: 这所谓的'洼地'，即使高阶修士用法宝全力飞遁，从一端到另一端也需年许。

scenes.description: 围着他修建的人族城市中最出名的,是由修士自己掌控的巨型城市'落日城'。

visual.composition: The most famous human city built around it is the giant 'Sunset City' controlled by cultivators

scenes.prompt: The most famous human city built around it is the giant 'Sunset City' controlled by cultivators.
scenes.narration: 围着他修建的人族城市中最出名的,是由修士自己掌控的巨型城市'落日城'。

scenes.description: 韩立走进落日城,看着两旁一个个高大整洁的店铺,脸上略现出一丝异色。

visual.composition: Han Li enters Sunset City, sees tall neat shops on both sides, shows slight surprise

scenes.prompt: Han Li enters Sunset City, sees tall neat shops on both sides, shows slight surprise.
scenes.narration: 韩立走进落日城,看着两旁一个个高大整洁的店铺,脸上略现出一丝异色。

scenes.description: 两旁店铺中坐着的不是炼气期修士,就是低阶炼体士等模样的掌柜。

visual.composition: Shop owners are either Qi Refining cultivators or low-level body cultivators

scenes.prompt: Shop owners are either Qi Refining cultivators or low-level body cultivators.
scenes.narration: 两旁店铺中坐着的不是炼气期修士,就是低阶炼体士等模样的掌柜。

scenes.description: 店铺中摆着的东西,下至妖兽材料,上至法器灵具,全都是五花八门的东西。

visual.composition: Shops display everything from beast materials to magical tools and artifacts, all varied
visual.character_pose: Han Li looking at displayed wares

scenes.prompt: Shops display everything from beast materials to magical tools and artifacts, all varied.
scenes.narration: 店铺中摆着的东西,下至妖兽材料,上至法器灵具,全都是五花八门的东西。

scenes.description: 韩立走到街道一拐角处,目光一扫后,突然朝附近一名和几人吐沫乱飞的枯瘦男子走去。

visual.composition: Han Li reaches street corner, scans area, suddenly walks toward thin man talking animatedly to others
visual.character_pose: Han Li approaching, thin man talking

scenes.prompt: Han Li reaches street corner, scans area, suddenly walks toward thin man talking animatedly to others.
scenes.narration: 韩立走到街道一拐角处,目光一扫后,突然朝附近一名和几人吐沫乱飞的枯瘦男子走去。

scenes.description: 枯瘦男子正在吹嘘自己的经历,突然一只手按在肩头,吓了一跳急忙转身。

visual.composition: Thin man boasting about his experience, suddenly hand on shoulder, startled and turns
visual.character_pose: Thin man startled, Han Li behind him

scenes.prompt: Thin man boasting about his experience, suddenly hand on shoulder, startled and turns.
scenes.narration: 枯瘦男子正在吹嘘自己的经历,突然一只手按在肩头,吓了一跳急忙转身。

scenes.description: 枯瘦男子看到韩立手上的灵戒,脸色一变,强笑问道:'在下田兴,兄台有什么指教吗?'

visual.composition: Thin man sees Han Li's spirit ring, face changes, forced smile asks: 'I'm Tian Xing, what can I help you with?'
visual.character_pose: Tian Xing cautious, Han Li smiling

scenes.prompt: Thin man sees Han Li's spirit ring, face changes, forced smile asks: 'I'm Tian Xing, what can I help you with?'
scenes.narration: 枯瘦男子看到韩立手上的灵戒,脸色一变,强笑问道:'在下田兴,兄台有什么指教吗?'

scenes.description: 韩立看田兴似乎对这座城市颇为了解,询问是否愿意做数日向导。

visual.composition: Han Li sees Tian Xing seems to know the city well, asks if he would be willing to be a guide for a few days
visual.character_pose: Han Li asking, Tian Xing listening

scenes.prompt: Han Li sees Tian Xing seems to know the city well, asks if he would be willing to be a guide for a few days.
scenes.narration: 韩立看田兴似乎对这座城市颇为了解,询问是否愿意做数日向导。

scenes.description: 田兴一喜,称自己在落日城待了数十年,没有不知道的地方,询问雇佣价格。

visual.composition: Tian Xing happily says he has been in Sunset City for decades, knows everything, asks about payment
visual.character_pose: Tian Xing eager, Han Li negotiating

scenes.prompt: Tian Xing happily says he has been in Sunset City for decades, knows everything, asks about payment.
scenes.narration: 田兴一喜,称自己在落日城待了数十年,没有不知道的地方,询问雇佣价格。

scenes.description: 韩立开价一天十块灵石,田兴嫌少讨价还价,最终以一天十二块灵石成交。

visual.composition: Han Li offers ten spirit stones per day, Tian Xing haggles, finally agrees on twelve per day

scenes.prompt: Han Li offers ten spirit stones per day, Tian Xing haggles, finally agrees on twelve per day.
scenes.narration: 韩立开价一天十块灵石,田兴嫌少讨价还价,最终以一天十二块灵石成交。

scenes.description: 田兴殷勤询问韩立想先去何处,韩立要求先去灵具材料店,并介绍城中情况。

visual.composition: Tian Xing eagerly asks where Han Li wants to go first, Han Li requests artifact material shops and city information
visual.character_pose: Tian Xing guiding, Han Li following

scenes.prompt: Tian Xing eagerly asks where Han Li wants to go first, Han Li requests artifact material shops and city information.
scenes.narration: 田兴殷勤询问韩立想先去何处,韩立要求先去灵具材料店,并介绍城中情况。

scenes.description: 田兴介绍落日城分为八个区域,五个是修仙者和炼体士居住交易区域,中心区域需缴纳灵石。

visual.composition: Tian Xing explains Sunset City has eight districts, five for cultivators and body cultivators, center district requires spirit stone fee
visual.character_pose: Tian Xing explaining, Han Li listening

scenes.prompt: Tian Xing explains Sunset City has eight districts, five for cultivators and body cultivators, center district requires spirit stone fee.
scenes.narration: 田兴介绍落日城分为八个区域,五个是修仙者和炼体士居住交易区域,中心区域需缴纳灵石。

scenes.description: 田兴提到中心区域汇集天元境多家大商号,有精品灵具和顶阶宝物,听说还有灵宝出售。

visual.composition: Tian Xing mentions center district gathers major trading companies from Tianyuan Realm, has fine artifacts and top-grade treasures, even spirit treasures
visual.character_pose: Tian Xing excited, Han Li interested

scenes.prompt: Tian Xing mentions center district gathers major trading companies from Tianyuan Realm, has fine artifacts and top-grade treasures, even spirit treasures.
scenes.narration: 田兴提到中心区域汇集天元境多家大商号,有精品灵具和顶阶宝物,听说还有灵宝出售。

scenes.description: 田兴突然想起重要消息,称拍卖行得到一套当年圣皇亲自使用过的天元武具,正准备拍卖。

visual.composition: Tian Xing suddenly remembers important news, says auction house obtained a set of Tianyuan Artifacts used by the former Saint Emperor, preparing to auction
visual.character_pose: Tian Xing excited, Han Li surprised

scenes.prompt: Tian Xing suddenly remembers important news, says auction house obtained a set of Tianyuan Artifacts used by the former Saint Emperor, preparing to auction.
scenes.narration: 田兴突然想起重要消息,称拍卖行得到一套当年圣皇亲自使用过的天元武具,正准备拍卖。

scenes.description: 韩立听闻天元武具一套五件,每件都是顶阶精品,能根据炼体士肉体强横表现出不同威力,脚步一顿。

visual.composition: Han Li hears Tianyuan Artifacts are a set of five pieces, each top-grade, adapt to body cultivator strength, stops walking

scenes.prompt: Han Li hears Tianyuan Artifacts are a set of five pieces, each top-grade, adapt to body cultivator strength, stops walking.
scenes.narration: 韩立听闻天元武具一套五件,每件都是顶阶精品,能根据炼体士肉体强横表现出不同威力,脚步一顿。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath night, spiritual light raining from the heavens
visual.environment: Night sky, city silhouette, floating light particles

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mysterious atmosphere, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第23集即将开始。
